nodes.text: Minister was a political title used by the head of an administrative department. During the Clone Wars, Wat Tambor served as Minister for the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Maketh Tua was a minister in the government of Lothal, an Outer Rim planet occupied by the Galactic Empire. Veris Hydan, one of the Emperor's advisers, was a minister. Senator Nower Jebel of Uyter served the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and later the New Republic, as Minister of Finance and had a seat on the Alliance Cabinet.
